column6: Daken takes center stage in this exploratory issue on his past, present and future...but what does that mean when Fang is the one doing the exploring? Shogun is constantly battling his inner demons, so what happens when his inner demon completely takes over? Fantomelle and Culpepper on a new mission focused on...Wolverine?
column8: | penciller (cover):Nick Bradshaw | writer:Ray Fawkes | writer:Charles Soule | artist:Peter Nguyen
